title: THE INDOOR CYCLING SHOE
subtitle: Cycling
description:
Whether it's spin class at the gym or your smart trainer at home, indoor training demands dedicated shoes that manage the heat and sweat of cycling in place. The adidas Indoor Cycling Shoes are designed around high-intensity efforts. Their breathable, lightweight upper keeps feet cool with enhanced ventilation. A stiff, full-length midsole insert transfers power for efficient pedalling. The hook-and-loop closure locks in your foot and makes for easy on and off. Go ahead and set that PR.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Hook-and-loop strap closure; Breathable textile upper with ventilation zones; Lightweight feel; Synthetic lining; Fiberglass-reinforced nylon midsole plate; Three-bolt cleat compatibility; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Turbo / Cloud White / Acid Red; Product code: GZ6343
colors: Linen Green / Core Black / Beam Yellow

title: adidas x LEGO® Superstar Shoes
subtitle: Youth Originals
description:
The classic and sleek silhouette that made the adidas Superstar sneaker so iconic gets a fun update with these juniors' shoes. The colorful heel tab celebrates this adidas and LEGO Group partnership with a LEGO® brick design, and hook-and-loop closures make them easy to slip on and off during your next adventure. The super soft sockliner ensures maximum comfort.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Synthetic leather upper; OrthoLite® sockliner; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Core Black / Pantone; Product code: GV8885

title: Ultraboost 5.0 DNA Shoes
subtitle: Youth Sportswear
description:
Any time you're on your feet is a good time to wear the adidas Ultraboost. These juniors' shoes pack all the performance techs that runners love into a design you'll want to wear outside of gym class. Beyond looks, its superpower is comfort – from the soft feel of the adidas PRIMEKNIT upper to the incredible energy return of BOOST.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT upper; BOOST midsole; Torsion System; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Shadow Green / Impact Orange / Core Black; Product code: HR1796
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Beam Pink

title: adidas by Stella McCartney Ultraboost 20 Shoes
subtitle: Women's adidas by Stella McCartney
description:
No matter how far your run is taking you, these adidas by Stella McCartney shoes support every step along the way. With their ultra-light and adaptable design, another block or another mile (maybe make it two) doesn't feel impossible. In fact, with the plush BOOST cushioning matching the energy you're throwing down, it's almost effortless.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

description: When the adidas Ultraboost debuted in 2015, it set the standard for comfort and performance in a running shoe. Each new release raises the bar, and this one is no exception. These running shoes are built for cold-weather runs, featuring COLD.RDY to keep feet warm. The energy-returning BOOST midsole is reflective, so it shines bright from dusk to dawn. The Continental™ WinterGrip™ Rubber outsole ensures a secure grip on slick streets.

Strike soft and push forward with a shoe designed to go the distance.
